title: Erotic Stories of Domination and Submission: Amy's Choice
description: Exclusive fine dining for those with discerning tastes read the advertisement for The Dining Club. Amy thought she'd been taken out to dinner; and yet before the evening was over, she would encounter a severe English ma√Ætresse, a mysterious periscope, an unexpected spanking, a vigorous dark-haired visitor, thick brocade bonds, a silver tray of sparkling gems, a cruel whip--and a series of highly charged sexual events all set in motion by Amy's choice.Amy's Choice is a graphic erotic novelette of 13,040 words (about 52 pages) in the Erotic Stories of Domination and Submission series from 1001 Nights Press. Contains material not suitable for minors.
author: James   Wood
